title: Beyond the Dunes
description: Northerner Ethan Gould arrives in the village of Bramblewick, Cornwall amid a spate of gruesome murders of young girls. Renting a cottage from renowned Pellar, or white witch, Tilly Waugh, Gould befriends her mentally handicapped grandson Barney.DCI Hatton leads a CID investigative team and draw up a list of suspects, which includes Barney, who viciously attacks a local DJ he believes is involved with Rachel, a girl he is infatuated with. With the murder of Rachel, Barney is now the prime suspect, but with no evidence, is released.Due to a series of incidents, DS Alice Rand adds her colleague DC Underwood to the growing list, along with Gould after discovering his secretive past.A tale that throws up many possible scenarios as detectives strive to discover the identity of the serial killer. An absorbing and compulsive thriller you will never forget.
author: Anthony Hulse
